ai-patthana18.9:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.9:1.1_0: for a reasoningle cause, without reason,
ai-patthana18.9:1.1_1: You shouldn’t give rise to a teaching for refuge. You shouldn’t give rise to cause a reason for cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.9:1.1_2: Because of a reason to teach without cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.9:1.1_3: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana18.9:1.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.9:2.1_0: You don’t give rise to the cause or reason for causes.
ai-patthana18.9:2.1_2: You don’t give a teaching with no cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.9:2.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
